name: business_intelligence_journey_evaluation
description: Test the business intelligence and client portal journey

steps.expected: Advanced reporting and business intelligence dashboard should load with custom KPIs

steps.action: Fill login form with username 'admin' and password 'admin123'
steps.expected: Should authenticate admin user and grant access to business intelligence
Should display advanced reporting and custom KPIs for business insights

Should display SSO, 2FA, and audit log capabilities for enterprise security
API development should be accessible for third-party integrations and custom workflow automation
